thread.title: Netflix’s Design-Themed Documentary Features Awesome Line-Up Of Creatives
thread.title_full: Netflix’s Design-Themed Documentary Features Awesome Line-Up Of Creatives

title: Netflix’s Design-Themed Documentary Features Awesome Line-Up Of Creatives
text: Netflix’s Design-Themed Documentary Features Awesome Line-Up Of Creatives By Dorothy Tan , 09 Feb 2017 Subscribe to newsletter Like us on Facebook When it comes to documentaries on design, Helvetica by Gary Hustwit remains one of the few films that has managed to reach a more or less mainstream audience. To bring a better understanding of design to the TV-watching masses, Netflix is set to release an original documentary series titled Abstract: The Art of Design . Featuring an impressive line-up of renowned creatives, including graphic designer Paula Scher, illustrator Christoph Niemann and photographer Platon, this documentary would bring you on a “journey through their creative process, explore their work, and discover how their innovative designs have profoundly affected our every day lives”.
